evidence.claim: Core Health Metrics IQ utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing.
The company has established HIPAA compliance protocols for managing sensitive health data.
Core Health Metrics IQ provides a FHIR API for health data interoperability.
They implement RESTful APIs for integration with EHR systems.
Amazon S3 is used for storing health-related data securely.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transaction use or clearinghouse operations found on their website.
